text: BUF may refer to: * Buffalo, New York, the second most populous city in the U.S. state of New York ** Buffalo Bills, a National Football League team based in the Buffalo–Niagara Falls region ** Buffalo Sabres, a National Hockey League team based in the Buffalo–Niagara Falls region ** University at Buffalo, a public university known as "Buffalo" or "BUF" ** Amtrak station code for Buffalo-Depew Rail Station in Buffalo, New York ** IATA airport code for Buffalo Niagara International Airport, Buffalo, New York * Baitul Futuh Mosque, London * British Union of Fascists, a former fascist political party in the United Kingdom * BUF Compagnie, a French visual effects company
title: BUF
